mapper.delete: delete from invitation where sender = #{sender} and receiver = #{receiver} and mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: select i.* from invitation as i where not exists (select a.* from invitation a, invitation b where a.sender = b.receiver and b.sender = a.receiver and i.sender = a.sender and i.receiver = a.receiver) and i.receiver = #{userid}
select i1.sender from invitation i1 inner join invitation i2 on i1.sender = i2.receiver and i1.receiver = i2.sender where i1.mid = i2.mid and i1.mid = #{mid}
